thread.title: Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival will offer daily shuttles from West Palm Beach
thread.title_full: Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival will offer daily shuttles from West Palm Beach | Examiner.com

author: Timothy Smith
title: Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival will offer daily shuttles from West Palm Beach
text:
Play The first annual Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival will offer three full days & nights of music & arts in the heart of Florida - the event will take place March 4-6 in Okeechobee, Florida. YouTube Mark your calendars as the first annual Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival will take place March 4-6, 2016 at Florida 's Sunshine Grove in Okeechobee, Florida.
okeechobeefest.com It looks as if the event planners are trying to get a Coachella-esque festival started in the sunshine state. For just about $300 you can purchase a ticket to camp out in the middle of nowhere, listen to Mumford & Sons, Big Grams, Skrillex as well as many more musical acts and pray that after three days the bugs have not eaten you alive.
Driving to the heart of Florida can be quite the trek for a lot of people which is why the event planners are offering daily shuttles to and from the 2016 Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival. Anyone living in West Palm Beach, Florida can pay $49.00 plus a $3.22 processing fee to hitch a ride to the Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival in Okeechobee, Florida. The shuttle pick up location is at the Tri-Rail station at 203 South Tamarind Avenue in downtown West Palm Beach. Shuttles will run every 60 minutes to and from the festival and passengers will be dropped off directly on the festival grounds in a dedicated bus area. If you are planning on spending $300 on a three-day festival ticket then you might as well throw in another $53 so that you are not having to waste your gas and deal with the hassle of finding a parking spot.
If dropping loads of cash to camp out in the middle of Florida is how you want to spend three days then the Okeechobee Music & Arts Festival is the place you will want to be. For complete information regarding the bands that will be playing as well as information regarding the purchase of festival/shuttle tickets, please visit www.okeechobeefest.com .
